mapper.select: SELECT AVG(duration) AS average, STDDEV(duration) AS std_error FROM trips WHERE station_in IN (#{station1}, #{station2}) AND station_out IN (#{station1}, #{station2})

SELECT station.id, COUNT( trips.id ) AS cnt FROM trips, station WHERE ( trips.time_in BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} ) AND station.station_id = trips.station_in GROUP BY station.id ORDER BY station.id ASC

SELECT station.id, COUNT( trips.id ) AS cnt FROM trips, station WHERE ( trips.time_out BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} ) AND station.station_id = trips.station_out GROUP BY station.id ORDER BY station.id ASC
